actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate relative to unduly restrictive state and local regulation of amateur radio antennas.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Federal Communications Commission should affirm that State and local regulations must not: (1) discriminate among amateur radio antennas and other types of home communications transmission or reception antennas; and (2) prohibit or frustrate the transmission or reception of amateur radio communications by federally licensed amateur radio stations, except as necessary to carry out a compelling governmental interest related to community health and safety.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate relative to unduly restrictive state and local regulation of amateur radio antennas.
